content: **knitted jumper in drops flora or drops babymerino the piece is worked top down with raglan lace pattern and cables sizes s - xxxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern fl-086 yarn group a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s - m - l - xl - xxl - xxxl **yarn** drops flora from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 300-300-350-350-400-450 g colour 30 desert rose or use drops baby merino from garnstudio belongs to yarn group a 350-350-400-450-500-550 g colour 49 desert rose **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm and 80 cm drops double pointed needles size 3 5 mm drops double pointed needles size 3 mm the technique magic loop can be used you then only need 80 cm circular needle in each size **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size
